text: @HealthCareStruggles🚨New report reveals the harsh reality of healthcare affordability in the US💸🏥 51% of working-age Americans struggle to pay for care despite having insurance! 😱 Those without insurance face even greater challenges. 🤕💔 #HealthCareReform #AffordableCare #Financial BurdenThe Commonwealth Fund study highlights the ongoing struggles faced by Americans in paying for healthcare. 💰🏥 Rising premiums, deductibles, copays, and other medical costs are creating a heavy financial burden, leaving many unable to afford the care they need. 🤯The findings are alarming: 3/4 of uninsured individuals face barriers in accessing healthcare due to cost, while over 100 million Americans carry debt related to healthcare expenses as of 2022! 😨💸 It's time for policymakers and stakeholders to take action and address the systemic issues plaguing our healthcare system. 🏛️💡Let's work together to ensure that everyone has access to affordable, quality healthcare! 🌟💕
